Articles.Content:
The Kelus-LV Bay Mobility Enhancer is the long ladder. However a recent bug I have been noticing more than once (actually more like 30 times) is present on Kerbal Space Program (STEAM) and Kerbal Space Program Enhanced Edition Complete.  The bug is that when attaching the ladder to a command pod the Kerbal will not be allowed to use the ladder to transfer over to the command moudule's ladder and vise versa. But you can use it to get off the ground and to connect it with other ladder.  Please fix this bugs Squad as this is makes it very hard to go likt Tylo or Eve. As EVA packs are just useless there.

When spotted: December 9, 2020

Reported: On KSP Forums (twice)

Reporter: Dr. Kerbal

Games: Kerbal Space Program, Kerbal Space Program Enhanced Edition Complete

4 minutes ago, Dr. Kerbal said:

The bug is that when attaching the ladder to a command pod the Kerbal will not be allowed to use the ladder to transfer over to the command moudule's ladder and vise versa.

The good news: this is not a bug, it's an intentional change they made recently. The even better news: they made it an optional setting, so you can change it back to how it worked before.

If you go to Settings from the main game menu, and look at the very last setting in the left row of the 'General' tab, you'll notice: 'Kerbals stop at end of ladder', default to ON. Just click to disable, and you got the old behaviour back.
